A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Disney screwed up one of the most beloved sagas of my childhood.
I liked:
* Nice photography.
* Old school special effects (like old saga)
I hated:
* Too many jokes.
* Too politically correct (feminism\, animalism\, .
* Too many "cute animals".
* Humiliated and low credible villains.
* "All old must die" message is disgusting and dangerous for children.
* They made beloved saga characters like Luke\, Leia\, Yoda and even Chewie do things so contradictory and stupid that made them unrecognizable.

In summary\, while Episode VII was just a copy of IV\, episode VIII copied V and VI and took a shitload on the story and killed it beyond any hope to fix it in next episode.

RIP Star Wars
